scenario_text.value: Hm? Ryo?
Oh, hey, Takuma.
What are you doing out here?

Just looking for some food to give to
that little...er, Kunemon.

I’ve started to get a pretty good idea of
what he says now.

It’s funny. He can be surprisingly charming
once you understand him.

(Sounds like Ryo is really looking out for
Kunemon.)

Heh, but man, look at you. Fawning all over
Kunemon, I mean.

You’d freak out at even the hint of him
getting closer to you in the beginning.

Shut up... I was just a punk who didn’t know
his ass from his elbow back then.

...Well I’m still a punk, I guess, but at
least I know who my friends are.
You’ve gotten pretty reliable, Ryo.

Hmph, lay off the compliments. I’m still the
same wuss I always was.

(He may say that, but I just think he’s alert
to the dangers around us.)

Y’know, man. All this Master stuff, the
fog... It makes this world so dangerous.

Yeah, you’re right. We have to stop it all
somehow.

Exactly... This place didn’t have anything to
do with us at first.

But now, this world means something to us.
It’s important to our pals, like Kunemon.
...We’ll protect it for sure.
Ryo... You’re like a mom or something.
I’m a WHAT now?!

Ah, no! I mean like, protective? Maternal?
Some kind of reliable, I just—
Fine, fine, whatever.

So I’m Kunemon’s mo—Kunemon’s protector? That
works for me.

Then I’d better protect that happy attitude,
too.

Oh, and Takuma, don’t forget to be nice to
Agumon, too.
Don’t worry, I won’t.
I’m serious, man. It’s really important.

These guys are some of the few allies we’ve
got. Never forget what that means.
